Sponsor_Check_And_Authorise_Page.outcomeBody: When you've finished checking the modification, select an outcome. Selecting 'Authorise' will authorise and submit the modification. If you select 'Not authorised' the researcher will need to prepare a new modification if changes are still required

When you've finished checking the modification, select an outcome. Selecting 'Authorise' will authorise and submit the modification. If you select 'Not authorised' the researcher will need to prepare a new modification if changes are still required
